raw_mentions:
Here is the extracted sentence:

[0136] Activity of compounds of the formula I was shown by an Eu based binding assay in which the binding of human von Willebrand factor to an europium (Eu)-chelate-labeled chimeric GPIb-Fc protein was induced by botrocetin. The preparation of the Eu-chelate-labeled chimeric GPIb-Fc protein is described in detail in a patent application (Fukuchi et al., EP1074564). IC50 (inhibition for 50%) values of all the compounds of the formula I were less than 100 microM.
